mapper.select: SELECT A.SQPRD_SEQ_NO , A.META_SEQ_NO , A.LANG_CD , A.SQPRD_CTGRY , FN_GETCODENM('GOODS_DIV', A.SQPRD_CTGRY, A.LANG_CD) SQPRD_CTGRY_NM , A.SQPRD_NM , A.SQPRD_ENG_NM , A.SQPRD_ATTN_ID , A.SQPRD_NAVY , TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(SVC_VALID_STAT_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SVC_VALID_STAT_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_TIMESTAMP(SVC_VALID_END_DATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SVC_VALID_END_DATE , A.SQPRD_SUMMARY_INFO , A.PC_LIST_IMG_PATH , A.PC_LIST_IMG_ORG_FILE_NM , A.PC_LIST_IMG_FILE_NM , A.PC_LIST_IMG_SIZE , A.PC_LIST_IMG_ALT , A.PC_DETL_IMG_PATH , A.PC_DETL_IMG_ORG_FILE_NM , A.PC_DETL_IMG_FILE_NM , A.PC_DETL_IMG_SIZE , A.PC_DETL_IMG_ALT , A.MOBILE_LIST_IMG_PATH , A.MOBILE_LIST_IMG_ORG_FILE_NM , A.MOBILE_LIST_IMG_FILE_NM , A.MOBILE_LIST_IMG_SIZE , A.MOBILE_LIST_IMG_ALT , A.MOBILE_DETL_IMG_PATH , A.MOBILE_DETL_IMG_ORG_FILE_NM , A.MOBILE_DETL_IMG_FILE_NM , A.MOBILE_DETL_IMG_SIZE , A.MOBILE_DETL_IMG_ALT , A.SQPRD_DETL_INFO , A.SQPRD_NOTI_CONTENTS , A.DEP_PORT_CD , A.ARRP_POT_CD , A.SHIP_TO , A.SQPRD_OPT1 , A.SQPRD_OPT2 , A.SQPRD_OPT3 , A.SQPRD_OPT4 , A.SQPRD_OPT5 , A.RELTD_SQPRD1 , A.RELTD_SQPRD2 , A.RELTD_SQPRD3 , A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG , FN_GETCODENM('GOODS_VW_TP', A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG, A.LANG_CD) AS VIEW_TYPE_IMG_NM , A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_BKGR_COLOR_OPT , FN_GETCODENM('GOODS_VW_BG_OP', A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_BKGR_COLOR_OPT, A.LANG_CD) AS VIEW_TYPE_IMG_BKGR_COLOR_OPT_NM , A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_BKGR_COLOR_CCD , FN_GETCODENM('GOODS_VW_BG', A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_BKGR_COLOR_CCD, A.LANG_CD) AS VIEW_TYPE_IMG_BKGR_COLOR_CCD_NM , A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_BKGR_COLOR_VAL , A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_FROM , A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_CCD , FN_GETCODENM('GOODS_VW_BG_DIV', A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_CCD, A.LANG_CD) AS VIEW_TYPE_IMG_CCD_NM , A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_TO , A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_HASH_TAG , A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_PATH , A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_ORG_FILE_NM , A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_FILE_NM , A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_SIZE , A.VIEW_TYPE_IMG_ALT , A.USE_YN , FN_GETCODENM('USE_YN', A.USE_YN, A.LANG_CD) AS USE_YN_NM , A.SRCH_CNT , A.ORDB , TO_CHAR(INS_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INS_DTM , A.INS_PERSON_ID , FN_GETMANAGERNM(A.INS_PERSON_ID) AS INS_PERSON_NM , TO_CHAR(UPD_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPD_DTM , A.UPD_PERSON_ID , FN_GETMANAGERNM(A.UPD_PERSON_ID) AS UPD_PERSON_NM FROM MK_SQPRD A WHERE 1=1 AND A.SQPRD_SEQ_NO = #{sqprdSeqNo}::integer
SELECT SQPRD_SEQ_NO , SQPRD_NM , SQPRD_CTGRY FROM MK_SQPRD WHERE SQPRD_SEQ_NO = #{sqprdSeqNo}::integer
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MK_SQPRD WHERE 1=1 AND SQPRD_SEQ_NO = #{sqprdSeqNo}::integer AND SQPRD_CTGRY = #{sqprdCtgry}
